title: Self-Determination Theory-Based School Leadership and Teacher-Student Relationship Strengthening Program

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary organizational management skills and comprehension of educational settings
context.additional_context: Designed for managers and educational personnel in language education companies, this blended learning program utilizes smartphone apps in resource-constrained technological environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the three basic psychological needs of Self-Determination Theory (SDT): autonomy, competence, and relatedness
Learners can propose at least three specific conversation strategies for improving teacher-student relationships
Learners can design school leadership scenarios by applying the PSSPN (Psychological Needs Support for Students) model

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
